_comment: Copy this file to credentials.json and fill in your ESI app details.
_instructions: 1. Create an ESI app at https://developers.eveonline.com/
2. Set callback URL to https://localhost/callback (or your server URL)
3. Add the scopes your scripts require (see below)
4. Do the OAuth flow once to obtain a refresh_token
5. Paste the values below and save as credentials.json
